Block * block [6][16]

Detailed Description

levelOne.cpp

Creates the design for the first level. Uses the polymorphism feature of the block.cpp class and randomly generates blocks of different colors and places them in a pre-defined layout.

Author: Natraj Subramanian

Definition at line 17 of file levelOne.h.
